attributes.action: stop the tax payer paying for MPs expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions of pounds a year are being spent on MPs expenses and this is not right. The money could be better spent on improving the NHS or the public schools.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the tax payer paying for MPs expenses."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21923


Prime Minister's Office
